entry.title: Awesome Web Monetization Updates on Feb 19, 2024
entry.content:
Resources / Tools

  • Is web monetized (‚≠ê5) - A very simple tool for checking if Web Monetization is enabled.

    npm install is-web-monetized -g
monetized example.com

    You can also test your website with the dependency.

entry.title: Awesome Web Monetization Updates on Sep 09, 2023
entry.content:
About Web Monetization

  • Documentation
  • How Web Monetization work for paying payments
  • How Web Monetization work for receiving payments
  • Specifications
  • ILP Forum (read only)

Resources / Packages

  • ngx-monetization (archived) (‚≠ê8) - Web Monetization API for Angular.
  • xrptipbot-wordpress-widget - WordPress Widget based on XRPTIPBOT embed code to donate content creators.

Resources / Tutorials

  • Getting started - Official documents from webmonetization.org.
  • Exclusive content - Put exclusive content on your website.

Resources / Tools

  • Probabilistic Revshare Generator - Web Monetization - Probabilistic revenue sharing (revshare) is one way to share a portion of a web monetized pages earnings between multiple payment pointers.

    Use this tool to define a list of payment pointers and their weights. Then, add the generated monetization link element to your site. The link will contain a unique URL hosted on https://webmonetization.org/api/revshare/pay/. If you'd prefer to not use a hosted URL, you can set up revshare by adding a script to your site.

entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Web Monetization Updates on Jul 03, 2020
entry.content:
Resources / Packages

  • monetize.js (‚≠ê16) - An event-driven library to manage and simulate Web Monetization.
  • types-wm (‚≠ê3) - TypeScript definitions for Web Monetization
  • react-hook-wm (‚≠ê9) - React hooks for integrating with Web Monetization.
  • react-monetize (‚≠ê36) - Helpers and hooks to speed up your integration with Web Monetization API.
  • ep_monetization (‚≠ê0) - Plugin for applying payment pointer meta tag to Etherpad site.
  • wp-connect-coil - Plugin for applying Coil payment pointer meta tag to WordPress site.
  • eleventy-plugin-monetization (‚≠ê23) - An Eleventy plugin to monetize posts and site content.
  • web-monetization-components (‚≠ê9) - A collection of web components you can use on your web monetized websites.
  • revshare (‚≠ê7) - A JS library for revenue sharing.
  • web-monetization-proxy (‚≠ê3) - Simple Go proxy for injecting Web Monetization meta tags.
  • gridsome-plugin-monetization (‚≠ê15) - Web monetization for Gridsome.
  • vuepress-plugin-web-monetization (‚≠ê15) - Adds the web-monetization metatag to your VuePress website.
  • jekyll-web_monetization (‚≠ê12) - A Jekyll plugin to add Web MonetizationAPI payment pointers to your site.

Resources / Articles

  • Monetizing Content in View - Paying for what you see.
  • Web Components - For the Web Monetization API (serie).

Resources / Newsletters

  • Newsletter of grantfortheweb.org - Sign up for email updates.

entry.title: Awesome Web Monetization Updates on Jun 25, 2020
entry.content:
Resources / Tools

  • Akita (‚≠ê23) - A browser extension that gives you insight into your involvement with Web Monetization.

    Akita presents your top visited monetized sites, how much time you're spending on them, and how much you're contributing (or could contribute) to them.

  • Open Monetization Wallet (‚≠ê12) - Tools for managing your vanity Web Monetization wallet.

    Open Monetization Wallet (OMW) makes it easier to accept payments with the Web Monetization API at scale. Some features:

    • Custom wallet URLs: own your own "Payment Pointer", e.g. $wallet.signalnerve.com, instead of $pay.stronghold.co/abcdef123
    • Change between wallets/providers with no downtime
    • Logs of incoming payment requests
    • Revenue sharing between multiple wallets, e.g. for multiple team members
    • Infinitely scalable with serverless technology
    • Free and open-source

Resources / Tools

  • Paytrackr (‚≠ê2) - (Forked from wobsoriano/paytrackr) - Track and manage your micropayments into one place.

    PayTrackr is the easiest and safest way to track and manage your micropayments to web monetized websites, having a web monetization provider membership.
